text: Admiral Ram贸n Castro Jij贸n (15 November 1915 - 1 November 1984) was an Ecuadorian politician. He was the President of Ecuador from 11 July 1963 to 29 March 1966. He was appointed commander of the Ecuadorian Navy by Carlos Julio Arosemena Monroy. He later overthrew Arosemena in a military coup. For his entire term as President he was chairman of a military junta. ==Other websites== * Official Website of the Ecuadorian Government about the country President's History Category:1915 births Category:1984 deaths Category:Admirals Category:Presidents of Ecuador Category:South American military people
